subject: Attention:  Beneficiary
body:
Attention:  Beneficiary
Long overdue Inheritance Consignment:
I hereby formally inform you that President Nana Akufo-Addo has
appointed me as the new Governor of the Bank of Ghana to replace
mypredecessor, Dr. Abdul Nashir Issahak.
All the corrupt practices that my predecessor led has finally come to
an end, and now you can breathe a sigh of relief as I solemnly promise
to release to you the outstanding long-overdue contract/Inheritance
funds of ($ 3.5 million), as mandated to me by the President.
Find the official letter attachment and a copy of my ID.
Yours sincerely,
Dr. Ernest Kwamina Addison.
New Governor, Central Bank of Ghana (bog)
Direct Number + 233-570819715,
Official Website: /www.bog.gov.
Private Email: 
dre015006@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Attention:  Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Ernest Kwamina Addison,

It's a pleasure to meet you! Congratulations on your new appointment as the Governor of the Bank of Ghana. It sounds like a very important role.

I'm intrigued by your mention of contract funds. Could you please elaborate more on this? What is the nature of these funds and how are they related to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ernesto

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary
body:
THanks a lot Mr Ernest My Name Sake.

It is my presure talking to you as well and thank you once again for your
compliment.

For your question, these funds were  mapped out by our President / all the
parliamentary board members of the house of assembly to re-settle all the
outstanding beneficiaries funds, eg: contract payment, next of Kin, award
willing and bonus funds, which the outgoing Governor could not handle.

Your name and email contact was included on the list given to me and was
sent to you by my secretary.

Congratulations once again.

I have attached my Id card and our form for you to fill and return back for
the processing of your funds.

Best regards.
Dr Ernest Kwamina Addison

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary
body:
Hello Dr. Ernest Kwamina Addison,

It's a pleasure to be in contact with you! I'm quite intrigued by the information you've shared. It sounds like a significant initiative taken by your President and the board members of the house of assembly.

Could you please elaborate more on how my name and email contact ended up on this list? I'm curious to know more about this process. Also, could you explain a bit more about these funds? What are they intended for?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ernesto

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary
body:
Dear Ernesto.

I must let you know that I have so much interest in you having noticed that
we bear the same name.

Well it will interest you to know that our name (AFRICA) at-large has been
blacklisted with so many lies about what we do and what we has not done.

However by releasing these funds to the rightful owners will go along way
to redeem our image globally as it will be on record in accordance with
section "A"

I will advise you to fill in the form I have sent to you and return back
asap for the processing of your funds alongside with others.

I know you might have executed a contract here with our government or your
Inheritance funds as stipulated on the list.

I will wait for the form.

Have a great day.
Best regards.
Dr Ernest Kwamina Addison
